content.rendered:
• RESTILING

    N E W
    C A R B O N

    FIND A RESELLER

  • G A L L E R Y

  • C O L O R S

  • T E C H N I Q U E

THE MOST EXCLUSIVE EBIKE IN THE WORLD


Carbon was born from an innovative project, which had the desire to melt the world of motorcycling and that of bicycles in a single product. Its unique shapes make it recognizable all over the world. The build quality resulting from the production process, completely Made in Italy, makes it a real work of art on wheels. Carbon can be used in any context, from urban to more sporty use, because its resistance and, at the same time, unparalleled elegance, make it suitable for any environment.

Carbon can have different colors, but nothing prevents you from creating a personalized design for those how are looking for further elegance or aggressiveness. Furthermore, there are four types of motor that can be mounted: 250W, 500W, 750W and 1000W. For those wishing to have even more power, it is possible to install even more performing engines.

PrecSucc
1234567

Colors

CLUB

Club Edition is the perfect starting point to create the customization that best suits the customer's taste, the large surfaces of the carbon frame allow you to create illustrations and dedicated liveries with the support of our designers.

FACTORY ORANGE

Factory reflects the racing soul of Moto Parilla,
a dynamic identity born on the tracks it contrasts
shiny and opaque personifying the being of
rational and extreme pilot.

FORESTA

Foresta was born as the spearhead of carbon graphics as it brings us closer to nature, it has been studied by analyzing the natural textures that we experience every day. We want to enhance the values of life and the beautiful country that is Italy.

MISTERO

Mistero stands out for its iconicity and tradition, an over time livery that does not feel the passing of the years characterized by colors of the same chromatic range, perfect for any occasion, all with a matte finish for those who love to appear.

PASSIONE

Passione is the personification of a dream, stands out in the
world thanks to Moto Parilla red, different from any other color in terms of brightness and intensity, a harmonious symphony is born when the red takes possession of violet reflections.

PERFORMANCE

Performance shows the world who carbon is. An aggressive livery that highlights the dynamism of the frame by sinuously following every change of direction and tension of it. We want to enhance the aesthetic quality of the carbon fiber, leaving it breathtaking.

CREATE YOUR OWN CARBON


With the Tailor Made project, we make it possible to create your own Carbon from scratch. From the carbon fiber of the core frame and blades, to the aluminum of the frame and swingarm, down to every detail that makes up the bike, everything can be chosen by the customer.

In collaboration with our design team, we start with the idea and work our way up to the finished product, through careful painting done by the best painters in the world.


Start with the idea

Unleash your creativity and tell us what your desire is. Don’t be afraid to dare!


Collaborate with us

In close collaboration with our style department, create the first render and imagine the uniqueness of your Carbon.


Turn it into reality

Rely on the world’s best painters to finally make your Carbon Tailor Made a reality.

PrecSucc
12345

Technical specifications

FRAME FRAME: monocoque carbon with aluminum reinforcement elements

BLADE FORK: in carbon with aluminum reinforcement elements

CENTRAL FRAME: composed of parts assembled in aluminum machined from solid

SWINGARM: composed of sheet metal and forged welded parts
SIZE L: height 185-200cm; crotch 92-100 cm

M: height 170-185cm; crotch 82-92 cm

S: height 160 – 170 cm; crotch 74 – 82 cm
AIR CHAMBER VeeRubber 26″x4,7″ (brand VeeTyres)
TIRES VeeRubber 26″x4,7″ (brand VeeTyres)
FRONT HUB Composed of two aluminum parts machined from solid developed by Moto Parilla
REAR HUB Composed of an aluminum part developed by Moto Parilla assembled with Enviolo
RIMS Aluminum rims 26 “diameter 80 mm wide
FRONT BRAKE DISC In heat treated steel, 380 mm diameter, developed by Moto Parilla
FRONT BRAKE DISC HOLDER Made from billet aluminum, developed by Moto Parilla
REAR BRAKE DISC In heat treated steel, diameter 203 mm, 6 holes, developed by Moto
FORK Composed of carbon rods (Blade), parallelogram lever system
HANDLEBAR STEM Pair of billet aluminum risers developed by Moto Parilla
HANDLEBAR Ergotec Low Riser, 31.8 mm connection diameter, 780 mm length, 15 mm rise
SADDLE Saddle covered in genuine leather in Italy with logo, developed by Moto Parilla
PEDALS M-Wave Black flat freeride pedal, steel pin and machined aluminum body
CRANKSET Bafang with 170mm brackets and 48 tooth chainring
KNOBS Herrmans with metal collar
SEAT POST Ergotec aluminum, diameter 27.2 mm, length 120 mm, black
SEAT LOCK Locking system developed by Moto Parilla
FRONT SHOCK ABSORBER DNM 165 mm
REAR SHOCK ABSORBER DNM 205 mm
FRONT LIGHT Herrmans H-Black MR8 E
REAR LIGHT Spanninga Pimento
STEERING SERIES Integrated 1 1/8 “headset with black finish
MOTOR Bafang MMG.320.48V – 250 Watt – 90 Nm – max speed 25 Km/h (15,5 mph)

Bafang MMG.320.48V – 500 Watt – 100 Nm – max speed 32 Km/h (20 mph)

Bafang MMG.320.48V – 750 Watt – 120 Nm – max speed 32 Km/h (15,5 mph)

POSSIBILITY OF ADDING ACCELERATOR
DISPLAY Display Bafang C961
BRAKES Formula Cura custom line braking system for Moto Parilla

Magura MT7 brake system
EASEL URSUS, Aluminum rear stand with screw fixing
TRANSMISSION Variator Enviolo NuVinci Sportive
CHANGE COMMAND Enviolo Grip modelOne turn
BATTERY 840 Wh (48V – 17,5 Ah)
CHARGER Charger 48V – 2A

Requests and orders


Use the form below to send us your request, whether it is a request for information or a purchase request. You will be contacted and in the event of a purchase request we will find the best solution, both in economic and logistical terms.





    TrilixCarbonTricoloreAccessoriesAltro
